title: Hollywood Hulk Hogan: Hulk Still Rules

sources.title: 1998 Hulk Hogan - The Ultimate Weapon - No fear. No rules. No equal.
sources.description:
Ben "Hardball" Cutter (Hulk Hogan), a battle-scarred Special Forces vet, uncovers a deadly arms deal masterminded by a rogue colonel (Michael D'Amico). When he destroys the weapons cache, a ruthless entrepreneur (Daniel Pilon) targets Ben's daughter (Cynthia Preston) for revenge. Now, Ben and his tech-savvy ally (Carl Marotte) must outsmart a shadowy network before time runs out!
